name: Norbert: The Anti-Virus
description:
Key Features:

-Dodge Norbits attempts at quarantining you (traps and projectiles)

-Answer Norbets questions (Chaptcha)

-Ultimately 'Enlighten' Norbert (Boss Fight)

Norbert is an Anti-virus, stuck in their delusions of grandeur.

Help Norbert discover the real world and liberate them from their delusions. 

You play a harmless Virus that stumbles upon Norbits world. Listen to his instructions or don't. After-all you are a virus.

Show Norbert where they went wrong, and make the world a better place.
